title: Run detail page with summary
description: Create the run detail page showing run metadata, summary statistics, and navigation to detailed results. This is where users investigate individual evaluation runs.
acceptance_criteria: Header: suite name, run ID, status badge
Metadata: version, trigger, trigger_ref, started_at, completed_at, duration
Summary cards: total cases, passed, failed, errored, avg score
Compare button (navigate to compare with this as baseline)
implementation_notes: Duration calculated from started_at and completed_at
Use formatDistanceToNow and format from date-fns
